content: Hmm... hm?! It's time to go to <style=Highlight>bed</style> and <style=Highlight>drift into dreams</style>! I feel like there's something I need to do before I sleep... Oh, I remember!

content: Tonight was the first time I've had seafood where even the shells were delicious. I think I ate too much though... Now my stomach feels like it's full of spiny sea urchins...

content: I have a feeling that tonight, when I <style=Highlight>drift off to sleep</style>, I'll dream of myself, you, and everyone else bouncing on a beetle jelly trampoline. Sounds like a wonderful dream, mmm!

content: But it's okay. I'll probably feel better after a good night's sleep, mm-hmm.
